item.title: Notice Asking Women Advocates To Stop 'Arranging Hair In Open Court' Causes Uproar
item.description: Notice Asking Women Advocates To Stop ‘Arranging Hair In Open Court’ Causes Uproar It is regularly seen that women advocates are styling their hair in open Court, which is disrupting the running of the Court,"

item.title: Miya Museum in Goalpara Sparks Sharp Reactions
item.description: Miya Museum in Goalpara Sparks Sharp Reactions The Goalpara Committee of the All Assam Miya Parisad inaugurated a Miya Museum in Gopalpara.

item.title: A Startup that is Changing the Paradigm of Travel
item.description: A Startup that is Changing the Paradigm of Travel Oddessemania is a travel tech startup that is trying to change the way people experience travel.

item.title: Vaastu Rules for Windows and Staircases
item.description: Vaastu Rules for Windows and Staircases The number of windows in a house should always be even like 4, 6, 8, 10 etc.

item.title: Tirumala temple to remain closed tomorrow due to Solar ecclipse
item.description: Tirumala temple to remain closed tomorrow due to Solar ecclipse The Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanam announced that Tirumala temple will be closed on Tuesday from 8 am to 7.

item.title: Hug your Way to a Healthy and Happy Life
item.description: Hug your Way to a Healthy and Happy Life The simple action of embracing creates feel-good energy for both the giver and recipient.

item.title: Video: PM Modi sings 'Maa Tujhe Salaam' along with soliders at Kargil on Diwali- WATCH
item.description: Video: PM Modi sings ‘Maa Tujhe Salaam’ along with soliders at Kargil on Diwali- WATCH He also laid a wreath at the Kargil War Memorial and paid tribute to the army personnel who lost their lives here in 1999.

item.title: Toddler attacked, killed by leopard at Mumbai’s Aarey colony
item.description: Toddler attacked, killed by leopard at Mumbai’s Aarey colony A leopard attacked the girl and injured her.

item.description: ‘BJP’s Sambit Patra, Iqbal Singh Lalpura violating Central Civil Services rules’: AAP Patra and Lalpura did not respond immediately to the AAP's demand for their removal.

item.title: Newly married teacher found dead
item.description: Newly married teacher found dead A 25-year-old newly married private school teacher was found dead under mysterious circumstances at her apartment in Puttenahalli on Saturday.
